# RAPdown

### A framework for creating Reproducible Analytical Pipeline (RAP) compliant Quarto publications

- The standard for creating analytical outputs in government
- Improve reliability, transparency, and reproducibility

::: {.features}

::: {.feature}
### Interactive Markdown Reports
Templates for interactive `.html` reports in Markdown; a lightweight markup language that is easy to read and write. Reports can be parameterised to create custom versions for many different geographies or topics.

::: {.learn-more}
[Learn more »](docs/computations/python.qmd)
:::
:::

::: {.feature}
### `Make`-like Data Pipelines
Workflow management to define dependencies in data processing pipelines. Specify the order in which tasks should be executed, and automatically rebuild parts of the pipeline if the input data or any of the intermediate results change.

::: {.learn-more}
[Learn more »](docs/output-formats/all-formats.qmd)
:::
:::

::: {.feature}
### Pre-configured Plotly Charts
Plotly is a popular data visualisation library with a wide range of interactive charts and graphs. RAPdown charts have been pre-configured, adjusting the colors, fonts, annotations, and labels to match a in-house style.

::: {.learn-more}
[Learn more »](docs/authoring/markdown-basics.qmd)
:::
:::
